category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ComplyingTraceReportTable_ColumnPreferences
preference.preference_description: Lists the names of properties that are displayed as columns for complying objects in traceability reports. Property names are added and deleted as the user inserts and removes columns in a traceability report. Valid Values: Accepts one or more Teamcenter property names as values. In columns for custom properties, the traceability report displays headings according to the Real Property Name format.
